Articles.Content: For some reason I cannot assign kerbals to a vessel. If I click on them it doesn't do anything. It'll show them when I build a ship but once I launch it they're not there, and the ship won't launch. Also if I go into the AC it won't let me recruit any new Kerbals. The only way I can launch a ship is if I add a probe core. Not sure what to do. Any help would be great. Thanks!
Did you get any mods that require a kerbal pilot on every rocket?
